Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that a "Registered Republican" was not allowed to vote, when in fact the person featured in the video was registered as a Democrat.
Falters at times: The claim falters by suggesting that Republicans were kept from voting in the Louisiana primary, when the video actually features a registered Democrat who couldn't vote in the closed Republican primary.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a single video and the personal account of the woman in the video. There is no additional evidence or data provided to support the claim that Republicans were not allowed to vote.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the woman's registration as a Democrat was a result of an error or intentional switch. However, there is no evidence presented to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists for the situation presented in the claim, which is that the woman's party affiliation was accurately reflected in the voter registration records and there was no error or switch.
